implementation.changes_made: Changed textarea CSS classes from 'overflow-hidden' to 'overflow-y-auto scrollbar-thin' to enable scrolling for long text input on mobile devices

notes: CSS-only change to enable vertical scrolling on textarea. The change replaces 'overflow-hidden' with 'overflow-y-auto scrollbar-thin' which allows users to scroll through long messages (7+ lines) while maintaining the existing auto-resize behavior for short messages. All 11 existing unit tests pass. Coverage for MessageInput.tsx is 78.66%.
